pr_title: [plugin-rest-api] Fix handling of '=' sign in FROM_JSON transformer

timeline.bodyText:
Just curious in the ticket mentioned this way Splitter.on(';').withKeyValueSeparator(Splitter.on("=").limit(2)).split(...)
Does it work? (I tried - it works)
